net.varkhan.base.conversion
Interface Decoder<T,C>

Type Parameters:
T - the type of objects that can be decoded
C - the type of the serialization context
All Known Subinterfaces:
Serializer<T,C>
All Known Implementing Classes:
ArraySerializer, AsciiDecoder, BooleanArraySerializer, BooleanSerializer, ByteArraySerializer, ByteSerializer, CharArraySerializer, DoubleArraySerializer, DoubleSerializer, FloatArraySerializer, FloatSerializer, IntArraySerializer, IntSerializer, LongArraySerializer, LongSerializer, MapSerializer, NullSerializer, RecordSerializer, ReferenceSerializer, ReflectSerializer, ShortArraySerializer, ShortSerializer, StringSerializer, StructSerializer, UnionSerializer, UTF8Decoder, VariadicSerializer
public interface Decoder<T,C>

A serialization decoder.
